## News
### nparACT 0.9.0 (2025-22-09)
First NEWS update. All changes will be documented in this file from now on.
Fixed unknown issues that led to removal from CRAN earlier this year. Roxygen
was now used to build the package and potential issues with running the worked
example have been solved.
